Pre-Game Insights: This will be the 12th Dodgers-Yankees matchup and the first in 43 years.
You could easily argue that on a global scale, the Yankees and the Dodgers are the most followed, the most supported, the most visible.
This figures to be the first World Series featuring five MVPs: the Dodgers' Ohtani, Freeman and Mookie Betts, and the Yankees' Aaron Judge and Giancarlo Stanton.
There hasn’t been a Fall Classic with four MVPs since 1971.
This will be the first Series with a pair of 50-home run hitters in Judge (58) and Ohtani (54).
